hero.title: Connect with Nature, Family, and God
hero.subtitle: A sanctuary in Tapaz, Capiz

mission.title: Welcome to Camp Moses
mission.description: Camp Moses is a family camp and retreat center dedicated to facilitating life-changing experiences where people can encounter God, strengthen family bonds, and find renewal in the beauty of His creation. Nestled in the heart of Tapaz, Capiz, we provide a sacred space for worship, fellowship, and spiritual growth.
mission.missionStatement: To create a sanctuary where life-changing experiences glorify God. We do this by offering a beautiful retreat center and Christ-centered teaching that strengthens faith and serves the Church.

scripture.text: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.statement: We strive to be a trustworthy, God-honoring ministry built on three promises

promises.title: Stewardship
promises.description: We faithfully manage our resources and are led by a joyful, supported staff and volunteer community.

promises.title: Sanctuary
promises.description: We provide a safe, beautiful, and well-equipped environment where nature reflects God's glory.

promises.title: Hospitality
promises.description: We serve our guests with excellence, anticipating needs and going above and beyond to make everyone feel welcome.

impact.title: Making a Difference
impact.description: The transformative power of Camp Moses through measurable community impact

donationTeaser.title: Help Us Continue This Mission
donationTeaser.description: Your support enables these youth camps, retreats, and community projects. Together, we can continue to build God's Kingdom and transform lives through the ministry of Camp Moses.

kubosSection.title: Explore the Kubos
kubosSection.description: Discover our unique accommodations designed for rest, fellowship, and connection with nature
